item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 18, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple mobile processors are now made in America by TSMC (764 points | 321 comments)
2. Show HN: Free AI tailored workout generator (8 points | 5 comments)
3. React for R (25 points | 8 comments)
4. Scramble: Open-Source Alternative to Grammarly (222 points | 86 comments)
5. Independent directors of 23andMe resign from board (428 points | 197 comments)
6. macOS Sequoia 15 may bypass DNS encryption (458 points | 144 comments)
7. Atkinson Hyperlegible Font (509 points | 142 comments)
8. Show HN: sol – A de-minifier for shell programs (50 points | 3 comments)
9. GraalPy – A high-performance embeddable Python 3 runtime for Java (252 points | 117 comments)
10. Rga: Ripgrep, but also search in PDFs, E-Books, Office documents, zip, etc. (421 points | 42 comments)
11. Asgard launches world's first DDR5-9600 DIMMs (32 points | 16 comments)
12. The Lego Great Ball Contraption (225 points | 39 comments)
13. John Peralta Explodes Historic Technology into Three-Dimensional Diagrams (58 points | 2 comments)
14. How Raw sockets behave differently in macOS and Linux (9 points | 2 comments)
15. Reports of the death of dental cavities are greatly exaggerated (108 points | 61 comments)
16. A Friendly Introduction to Assembly for High-Level Programmers (155 points | 18 comments)
17. Show HN: Open Scanner, an open-source document scanning app for iPhone (213 points | 70 comments)
18. Scrolling Text Display (49 points | 2 comments)
19. Hezbollah pager explosions kill several people in Lebanon (863 points | 1889 comments)
20. Why Gauss wanted a heptadecagon on his tombstone (263 points | 56 comments)
21. Implement algorithms that minimize slippage (36 points | 2 comments)
22. Rustpad is an efficient and minimal open-source collaborative text editor (54 points | 5 comments)
23. OpenTelemetry Tracing in < 200 lines of code (177 points | 23 comments)
24. Emerge Tools (YC W21) is hiring a senior front end engineer ( | hide)
25. 26-Year-Old EY Employee Succumbs to 'Work Stress' Four Months After Joining (119 points | 57 comments)
26. STORM: Get a Wikipedia-like report on your topic (106 points | 48 comments)
27. The port of the Windows 95 Start Menu was not all it seemed (40 points | 27 comments)
28. Launch HN: Marblism (YC W24) – Generate full-stack web apps from a prompt (116 points | 75 comments)
29. WonderWorld: Interactive 3D Scene Generation from a Single Image (154 points | 15 comments)
30. Australia arrests dozens over app allegedly used by criminals worldwide (9 points | 2 comments)
